meanings.definition: A cosmetic treatment of the feet and toenails.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy getting a pedicure to make my feet look pretty.
meanings.sent2: She went to the salon for a pedicure before her beach vacation.
meanings.sent3: The pedicure made her toes sparkle like little gems.
meanings.sent4: After the pedicure, her feet felt as light as feathers.
meanings.sent5: The pedicure was like a mini spa day for her tired feet.

meanings.sent1: She likes to pedicure her friends as a fun activity.
meanings.sent2: He learned how to pedicure properly at beauty school.
meanings.sent3: They joked that he could pedicure his way to fame and fortune.
meanings.sent4: She pedicured with such precision, it was like watching an artist at work.
meanings.sent5: Pedicuring her feet felt like a soothing ritual of self-care.
